title: The Murder of Grace Cooper

victim.name: Grace Cooper
victim.appearance: tall and brunette with piercing blue eyes and sharp cheekbones
victim.description: Grace is fiercely independent, confident, and unafraid to speak her mind. Despite her professional success, Grace is quite introverted and doesn't have many close friends. She is always impeccably dressed and takes pride in her appearance.

crimeScene: Grace's home after a dinner party

suspects.name: Mark Johnson
suspects.appearance: tall and lean with chiseled features and bright blue eyes. He always wears expensive suits.
suspects.alibi: present at a business dinner with several colleagues
suspects.motive: Grace was working on a case against his company, which could lead to significant financial losses.
suspects.story: Mark had actually hired a hitman to take care of the problem and had no direct involvement in the murder.

suspects.name: Emily White
suspects.appearance: long, curly hair that she often wears in a messy bun. She has striking green eyes and delicate features. Emily is always impeccably dressed and usually wears her own designs, which can range from whimsical to edgy.
suspects.alibi: at a fashion show on the night of the murder, surrounded by dozens of witnesses
suspects.motive: Emily and Grace were once close friends, but had a falling out several years ago over a business deal that went sour.
suspects.story: Emily had mixed a deadly poison with the bottle of wine that she had gifted to Grace for her birthday. She slipped away unnoticed from the fashion show and administered the poison to Grace.

suspects.name: Alex Rodriguez
suspects.appearance: tall and muscular with tan skin and dark hair that he keeps short and spiky. Alex usually wears tight-fitting t-shirts and jeans.
suspects.alibi: working at the bar on the night of the murder, confirmed by several patrons
suspects.motive: Grace had recently confronted him about his inappropriate behavior towards some of the female patrons.
suspects.story: No evidence to suggest involvement in the murder.

suspects.name: Dr. James Lee
suspects.appearance: tall and lean with a square jawline and piercing brown eyes. He keeps his hair short and neat and always wears a lab coat over his scrubs.
suspects.alibi: at the hospital on the night of the murder, performing emergency surgery on a patient
suspects.motive: Grace had filed a malpractice suit against him for a botched surgery that left her with permanent nerve damage.
suspects.story: No evidence to suggest involvement in the murder.

truth.how: mixed a deadly poison with the bottle of wine that she had gifted to Grace for her birthday
truth.why: Emily and Grace were once close friends, but had a falling out several years ago over a business deal that went sour. Emily had also stolen Grace's designs and passed them off as her own.
truth.trick: claimed to be at a fashion show on the night of the murder, surrounded by dozens of witnesses. She had even posted pictures of herself at the event on social media to prove her whereabouts.
truth.loophole: left a strand of her hair at the crime scene while trying to clean up the evidence.

prologue: Grace Cooper, a successful corporate lawyer, was found dead at her home after a dinner party. As a detective, you must uncover the truth behind her murder and bring the killer to justice.
